text: Ankst is a Welsh independent record label formed in 1988 at Aberystwyth University. Ankst has been the launch-pad for several popular Welsh artists, including Super Furry Animals and Gorky's Zygotic Mynci. The label is now based in Pentraeth on Anglesey. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:British record labels Category:1988 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:20th-century establishments in Wales
title: Ankst
